title: Incomplete enum Windows.System.ProcessorArchitecture
body: Maybe not really a big... but enum Windows.System.ProcessorArchitecture is missing the value for ARM64, which is a valid UWP compilation target for Windows 10 Build 16299 and above.

comments.body:
It's especially a pity that I cannot detect if my package is ARM64:
Package.Current.Id.Architecture (returning above enum)
